thread.title: HomeEscape Keeps Travelers Informed with Best Family Travel Destinations
thread.title_full: HomeEscape Keeps Travelers Informed with Best Family Travel Destinations

author: prbuzz.com
title: HomeEscape Keeps Travelers Informed with Best Family Travel Destinations
text:
MIAMI, FL (10/16/2015) HomeEscape, the web’s fastest growing vacation rental website, released a guide to the best family destinations .
“With our growing property list, it’s important that users are educated about the attractions of different destinations,” says Avi Vaknin, CEO and Founder of HomeEscape. “Part of the fun of traveling is discovering out-of-the-way locales,” Avi remarked.
HomeEscape is the first truly free travel website, giving travelers a chance to access vacation rental listings for free and giving owners an opportunity at free advertisement.
“So far, we’ve had an overwhelmingly positive response,” Avi said. “We are enthusiastic about good deals – and since we do not charge our users – HomeEscape is growing rapidly.”
About HomeEscape: Headquartered in Miami, Florida, HomeEscape connects homeowners and property managers with travelers who seek the space, value and amenities of vacation rental homes as an alternative to hotels. With detailed property descriptions, photos and list of amenities and nearby attractions, HomeEscape makes it easy to find and compare properties all over the world.
Contact HomeEscape
